choices.text:
### Human:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
### Assistant:

Hi there!  I wanted to let you know that I will be leaving the company effective immediately.  It has been a pleasure working with you all, and I wish the team all the best in the future. 

Thank you for your understanding during this time of transition, and please feel free to contact me directly if any further information or documentation is needed regarding my departure from the organization. 
Best regards,
[Your Name]<|im_end|>
